Etymology 2
Adjective
Etymology 3
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|おおし}}

From {{inh|ja|ojp|sort=おおし|-}}.

Appears to be a lexicalized adverbial use of the {{m|ja|終止形||tr=shūshikei|terminal form}} of classical adjective {{m|ja|多し||tr=ōshi|many|pos=modern {{m|ja|多い|tr=ōi}}, same ''opo'' → ''ofo'' → ''oho'' → ''ō'' root}}.

Alternatively, might be adjective stem ''ō'' + conjunctive particle {{ja-r|し}}.

subSections.title: Adverb
